name: Stair Calculator Pro
description: Stair Calc Pro is a fast, easy way to create stair calculations. Put your pencil down and start making professional, consistent calculations today.   - Solve rise, run, incline, headroom, stringer length, throat and more.  - View a detailed diagram of the stairwell or the stringer that is to scale and zoomable.  - Change font size, arrow size, line width, and more to customize your drawing.  - Work in either imperial or metric. - Built in construction calculator allows intermediate calculations to be performed within the app.
